DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a storm bolter. Change the Armour Penetration characteristic of that model's storm bolter to -2 and the Damage characteristic to 2, until the end of the battle round
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a storm bolter. Change the Armour Penetration characteristic of that model's storm bolter to -2 and the Damage characteristic to 2, until the end of the battle round
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a storm bolter. Change the Armour Penetration characteristic of that model's storm bolter to -2 and the Damage characteristic to 2, until the end of the battle round

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick a Sister Repentia to attack in the Fight phase. Change the Damage Characteristic of that model's penitent eviscerator to 3, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick a Sister Repentia to attack in the Fight phase. Change the Damage Characteristic of that model's penitent eviscerator to 3, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic when you pick a Sister Repentia to attack in the Fight phase. Change the Damage Characteristic of that model's penitent eviscerator to 3, until the end of the phase.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Arco-Flagellant model from your kill team to make attacks in the Fight phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model for each enemy model within 1" of it when it is selected to Fight, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Arco-Flagellant model from your kill team to make attacks in the Fight phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model for each enemy model within 1" of it when it is selected to Fight, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic when you pick an Arco-Flagellant model from your kill team to make attacks in the Fight phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model for each enemy model within 1" of it when it is selected to Fight, until the end of the phase.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a flamer. You can re-roll the dice to determine the number of attacks made by this model's flamer, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a flamer. You can re-roll the dice to determine the number of attacks made by this model's flamer, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a flamer. You can re-roll the dice to determine the number of attacks made by this model's flamer, until the end of the phase.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a Canoness. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a Canoness. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model.
DescriptionDe: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a Canoness. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model.
